headline: Otis Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.42 per Share
summary: The Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.42 per share of Otis' common stock. The dividend will be payable on December 5, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on November 14, 2025.

headline: Otis Worldwide: Evaluating Valuation Following Strong Q3 Results and Raised Earnings Guidance
summary: Otis Worldwide (NYSE:OTIS) just delivered third-quarter results that topped estimates, thanks to impressive growth in its Service business and a surge in modernization orders. The company also raised its full-year adjusted EPS guidance. See our latest analysis for Otis Worldwide. Otis Worldwide’s upbeat third-quarter results and a robust buyback program have sparked fresh momentum, with shares recently climbing to $93.38. This represents an increase of nearly 9% over the past three months...

headline: OTIS Q3 Deep Dive: Service Momentum Drives Growth Amid New Equipment Headwinds
summary: Elevator manufacturer Otis (NYSE:OTIS) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 4% year on year to $3.69 billion. The company expects the full year’s revenue to be around $14.55 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.05 per share was 4.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
